English.Name: Encore
English.Category:
"Basic Information"[CS:E][BAR][CR]
Afflicts the targeted enemy with an
[LS:13606]Encore[LE] status condition. A Pokémon with
the [LS:13606]Encore[LE] status can use only the move
it last used.
